sentences.sContent: the pathos of the woman trying to keep her lover
sentences.sCn: 那个女人试图留住爱侣的哀婉之情

synos.tran: 悲怅；痛苦；同情；哀婉动人的词句

remMethod.val: path (感情) + os → 痛苦， 感伤

trans.tranCn: 痛苦， 感伤； 悲悯， 同情
trans.tranOther: the quality that a person, situation, film, or play has that makes you feel pity and sadness
